name: Liquify
description:
Play as a liquid slime creature out for blood and gold shoot yourself at your enemies, keep your combo counter up and make your way through a labyrinth of treasure and mobs.

This game was originally made in 72 hours for Mini-Jam 84
Theme: Bubbles
Limitation: You are your own ammo

Programming, Design, and Sound Effects by Michael Williams - Bouncing Turtle
Music and Sound Effects by Ben Nissimov - https://soundcloud.com/bennissimov
